title: Elections in auth. regimes provide legitimacy

content.question: Citizens of nondemocratic regimes may be allowed to participate in elections in order to

choices.label: prepare the country for a transition to democracy
allow voters a choice between candidates and/or parties
assess the state of public opinion
provide legitimacy to the ruling regime
give opposition parties the opportunity to form

content.answer: provide legitimacy to the ruling regime

topic.text: 3.5: Nature and Role of Political Participation
